snippet: The American delegation to the United Nations informed members of the Security Council that it would circulate a draft resolution establishing a sanctions regime for South Sudan, a United States official said.
abstract: American delegation to the United Nations informs Security Council that it will circulate a draft resolution establishing sanctions regime for conflict-torn South Sudan.
lead_paragraph: The American delegation to the United Nations informed members of the Security Council that it would circulate a draft resolution establishing a sanctions regime for South Sudan, a United States official said.

headline.main: U.S. Offers Resolution to U.N. for South Sudan Sanctions
headline.print_headline: U.S. Offers Resolution to U.N. for South Sudan Sanctions
